nodes.text: The Bright Jewel Cluster, also known as the Bright Jewel Systems Cluster, was located in the Mid Rim region. It contained the Gordian Reach, and was administered by Governor-General Nox Vellam. Planets within the cluster included Ord Mantell in the Bright Jewel sector. Under the New Order, the cluster was part of Bright Jewel Oversector.
